item.title: About Me
item.description: Who Am I? ü§î My name is Ashraf and I‚Äôm a sophomore undergraduate currently pursuing a Computer Engineering Degree at the National University of Singapore (NUS). I am also an aspiring entrepreneur with a goal to create my own startup that can make the world a better place through innovative products for the masses! I have a strong passion in analyzing companies and strategizing possible angles for upscaling businesses.

item.title: Projects
item.description: ConTech A Command Line Interface (CLI) application for managing computing-related contacts. Optimised for use on the CLI, ConTech allows you to seamlessly add, edit, view, list, search, and import your contacts. ConTech aims to improve your efficiency at work, be it by cutting down the time required to look up for various usernames when working with colleagues, or by importing hundreds of contacts with just one simple command.
